Material used.Description: The experiment used HEK293 cells and patient-derived fibroblasts expressing PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were reduced by 30-50% in cells expressing p.G289D.
Protein expression levels were reduced by 20-40% in cells expressing p.G290D.
Protein expression levels were reduced by 40-60% in cells expressing p.G291D.
Protein expression levels were reduced by 50-70% in cells expressing p.G292D.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: The experiment used HEK293 cells transiently transfected with PARK2 variants and luciferase reporter plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: Luciferase activity was increased by 20-30% in cells expressing p.G289D.
Luciferase activity was increased by 15-25% in cells expressing p.G290D.
Luciferase activity was increased by 25-35% in cells expressing p.G291D.

Readout description.Result意图: Luciferase activity was increased by 30-40% in cells expressing p.G292D.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Luciferase activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Luciferase activity exceeding 20% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: The experiment used transgenic mice expressing PARK2 variants for immunohistochemical analysis of brain tissue.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased ubiquitination of PARK2 protein was observed in transgenic mice expressing p.G289D.
Increased ubiquitination of PARK2 protein was observed in transgenic mice expressing p.G290D.

Readout description.意图: Increased ubiquitination of PARK2 protein was observed in transgenic mice expressing p.G291D.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased ubiquitination of PARK2 protein was observed in transgenic mice expressing p.G292D.

Biological replicates.Description: Five biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates were explicitly mentioned.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 transgenic mice were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Chi-square test was used for statistical analysis of immunohistochemical staining patterns.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Ubiquitination levels within 15% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Ubiquitination levels exceeding 30% of wild-type controls.
